mapper.select: select ORDER_IDX, UC_IDX, USER_IDX, o.order_date, PRD_IDX, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, o.state, ORDER_CNT, SAVE_MONEY, p.name, p.brand, po_name from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where user_idx = #{userIdx} order by reg_date desc

select ORDER_IDX, USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, ORDER_DATE, o.STATE, ORDER_CNT, UPDATE_DATE, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where USER_IDX = #{userIdx} and o.STATE = 1 order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select r.RV_IDX, r.USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, r.ORDER_IDX, r.STATE, r.RATING, r.TYPE, r.RECOMMAND, r.REG_DATE, RV_CONTENT, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name from REVIEW r inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where USER_IDX = #{userIdx} and r.STATE = #{state} order by reg_date desc

select ORDER_IDX, USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, o.state, ORDER_CNT, p.name, p.brand, po_name from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where user_idx = #{userIdx} and o.state = 1 and o.order_idx = #{orderIdx}

select SH_IDX, USER_IDX, s.STATE, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.REG_DATE, PRD_IDX, p.NAME from SAVE_HISTORY s join "ORDER" o using(user_idx) join product p using(prd_idx) where user_idx = #{userIdx} order by reg_date desc

select COUPON_IDX, c.NAME, c.SALE_PER, c.IS_DEL, u.USER_IDX, u.reg_date, u.UC_IDX, u.EXP_DATE from user_coupon u inner join coupon c USING(COUPON_IDX) where u.user_idx = #{userIdx} and u.exp_date > sysdate
select USER_IDX, EMAIL, NICKNAME,GRADE, USER_ID, ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, SAVEMONEY,IS_LEAVE ,USER_NAME, ORDER_IDX from "USER" u inner join "ORDER" o USING(USER_IDX) where USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

select QNA_IDX, USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, ORDER_IDX, TITLE, q.CONTEXT, q.TYPE, q.REG_DATE, IS_ANSWER, AW_CONTEXT, AW_REG_DATE, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name from QNA q inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
